channel.title: Over The Fire Cooking by Derek Wolf
channel.description:
If anyone says that Netflix cannot change your life, then they are lying. I first fell in love with fire cooking on my couch watching TV while procrastinating school work in college. While scrolling through the endless list of shows, I found a documentary following a South American chef and his adventures cooking with fire. It was love at first sight. I had to try it myself. When my wife and I got a fire pit as a wedding present, we decided to put it to good use. The first meal we cooked was a nice skirt steak with some homemade chimichurri sauce. It must have been beginners luck because it tasted delicious. From that moment on, I decided that if I was grilling, then I was grilling over a fire.
What started as a passion for fire cooking and photography has found me doing Youtube! We post recipes three times a week with tons more on our Facebook, Instagram and blog! Come follow along!

image.title: Over The Fire Cooking by Derek Wolf

item.description:
Cheesy Buffalo Chicken Sliders are a backyard tradition! 🧀🍗🌶🍞🍻
Between the Super Bowl coming up or just wishing for warmer weather, these Cheesy Buffalo Chicken Sliders are a winner. Cooked on my @oklahomajoes Bronco Drum Smoker, they are tangy, spicy, cheesy and super delicious. Plus, they are really easy to make! Find the whole recipe on my blog linked below. 🍻👍
The Recipe: https://overthefirecooking.com/cheesy-buffalo-chicken-sliders/
Order my new cookbook here: https://www.amazon.com/Food-Fire-Grilling-Derek-Cooking/dp/1592339751/
Find all my rubs here: https://spiceology.com/pages/derek-wolf/
Subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/overthefirecooking/
Why not follow me elsewhere?
Blog: http://www.overthefirecooking.com/ Instagram: http://instagram.com/overthefirecooking/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/overthefirecooking/ Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/overthefirecooking/ Tik Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@overthefirecooking/
#shorts #short #buffalochicken #chickensliders
